sense.def:
A sail
je velik kos blaga ali podobnega materiala, ki je pritrjen na jambor. Ko se veter ujame v ta material, premika plovilo po vodi.

To sail a boat
pomeni voditi jadrnico z jadri.

seg.quote: I spent two weeks swimming and sailing in New Hampshire.

sense.def:
Kadar ladja
sails
, se premika po vodi.

seg.quote: The ship sailed down the east coast of South America.

sense.def:
Kadar ladja
sets sail
, zapusti pristanišče.

Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
sails somewhere
, se enakomerno in precej hitro giblje v določeno smer.

seg.quote: I watched the ball as it went sailing over the bushes.

sense.def:
To sail through a difficult situation or experience
pomeni zlahka in uspešno opraviti s težavnim položajem ali izkušnjo.

seg.quote: She was expecting to sail through her exams.
